snippet: Cory Schneider had 15 saves before leaving early in the third because of an injury.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Dallas Stars defeat New Jersey Devils, 4-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Cory Schneider had 15 saves before leaving early in the third because of an injury.

headline.print_headline: Stars Hand the Devils Their Seventh Loss in Nine Games
